title: Ep 346 | Phil Learns What FOMO Is & Jase Has a 4 a.m. Encounter in the Middle of the Road
description:
Phil recalls the time he was too sick to go duck hunting, and Jase teaches him the meaning of “FOMO.” Jase describes his 4 a.m. encounter with a person sitting in the middle of the road. Phil and Jase talk about how Jesus would have cooked his fish. Jase explains why the image of people floating on a cloud in heaven is false and misguided. And the guys explore why God placed us on Earth
